document_data.name: Luxewa
document_data.mainbody: '''Luxewa''' was a [[night hag]] in the [[Moonsea]] in [[1373 DR]].
document_data.Activities:
Luxewa laired in some caves in the south of the [[Galena Mountains]], near [[Mulmaster]]. 

When threatened, she preferred to fight from a distance with [[spell]]s, but if forced into melee, she would attempt to inflict [[demon fever]] on her enemies.
document_data.History: In 1373 DR, the area was conquered by the [[fire giant]] brothers [[Soluf]] and [[Gharod]] but as they were not very smart, Luxewa often acted as their advisor.
